caption.title: Summary of the parameters, the physical description of these parameters, and the default values used for the parameters of the lattice model.

tr.td: Number of PRMs and SH3 domains per poly-PRM and poly-SH3
Intrinsic affinity between PRMs and SH3 domains
Length of disordered linker between interaction domains
Degree to which the Linker Prefers Interacting with Solvent
Proportional to the number of explicitly modeled linker beads
